game.name: jmapacman
game.description:
JMaPacman is a clone of the old Arcade Game Pacman with new features and news design.
Now you can play Pacman with many of your friends together in one Game. You have many levels to explore and many dots to eat ;)
Who will reach the Top Score ?

JMaPacman is totally platform independent, written using Java 1.5 and the Java2D environment.
game.extended:
Play now!

JMaPacman uses Java Webstart technology that enables you to use always the latest version available without having to worry about updates.
Just click on the button to play.
game.changelog:
0.20 Jun 22, 2005
- added Zones (4 different Maps to play)
- added GhostBlock. An invisible items to block Ghosts only
- added SuperDots
- added Wrapper-Class for Dots/Superdots (only Serverside atm)
- fixed Bug with scrolling


0.10 Jun 14, 2005
- First release

file.name: jmapacman-XXX.zip
file.description: This file contains the JMaPacman client. Download this to play online.

file.name: jmapacman-server-XXX.zip
file.description: This file contains the JMaPacman server plugin. You need marauroa in order to play correctly.

file.name: jmapacman-XXX-src.tar.gz
file.description: This file contains the source code to build JMaPacman.
